# Contributing

## Getting Started

1. Fork this repository
2. Create branch: `feat/your-feature`
3. Commit: `feat: add your feature`
4. Push to your fork
5. Open PR â†’ develop branch only

## Branch Naming

- feat/feature-name
- fix/bug-name
- docs/update-readme

## Commit Convention

- feat: new feature
- fix: bug fix
- docs: documentation
- chore: maintenance
